metadata.synopsis: Hoping to land a role, two Japanese actresses (Eiko Koike, Maho Nonami) begin a fight that keeps escalating within an apartment.

reviews: Yukihiko Tsutsumi's script and direction are sublime, particularly considering the difficulty of the project
The two rival wannabes who are his principal characters may learn just how hard it can be to survive in the movie business, but Tsutsumi himself makes filmmaking look easy.
entertaining quirky little film that is worth a look
one quick visit to hell you aren't likely to forget soon
If two girls beating the hell out of each other is your idea of entertainment, then 2LKD belongs on your must-see list.
